actionTemplate.title: Meteor Brow
steps: Place the arch slightly back and higher for an upward trajectory
Angle the lower line upward from the front toward the tail
Make the tail long, thin, and slightly lifted
Keep the front soft; deepen around the arch and tail
Soften the top edge with a brush so it doesn't look sharp

rationaleTemplate: An upward trajectory looks energetic and sharp.
Great when you want a subtle lifting effect.
